TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit AssemblyLoadContext extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示运行时绑定范围的概念。

span.span: Represents the runtime's concept of a scope for binding.

summary.span: 此类为抽象类。

span.span: This class is abstract.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示加载上下文。The represents a load context. 从概念上讲，加载上下文创建和加载、 解析时，可能会卸载一组程序集的作用域。Conceptually, a load context creates a scope for loading, resolving, and potentially unloading a set of assemblies. 是一个抽象类。 is an abstract class. 需要实现创建一个具体类。The needs to be implemented to create a concrete class. 存在主要是为了提供程序集绑定隔离。The exists primarily to provide assembly binding isolation. 它允许在单个进程中加载同一程序集的多个版本。It allows multiple versions of the same assembly to be loaded within a single process. 它取代了由多个提供的隔离机制.NET Framework 中的实例。It replaces the isolation mechanisms provided by multiple instances in the .NET Framework. > [!NOTE] > 不提供任何安全功能。 does not provide any security features. 所有代码都具有完全权限的过程。All code has full permissions of the process. ### 在运行时中的使用情况Usage in the runtime 在运行时实现两个程序集加载上下文：The runtime implements two assembly load contexts: * 表示用于应用程序主程序集及其依赖静态运行时的默认绑定上下文。 represents the runtime's default binding context which is used for the application main assembly and its static dependencies. * 方法将它加载通过实例化的最基本的程序集隔离开来。The method isolates the assemblies it loads by instantiating the most basic . 具有此操作将加载其自身中的每个程序集的简单隔离方案没有依赖关系得到解决。It has a simplistic isolation scheme which loads each assembly in its own with no dependency resolution. ### 应用程序使用情况Application usage 应用程序可以创建其自己创建自定义解决方案的高级绑定方案。An application can create its own to create a custom solution for advanced binding scenarios. 自定义项侧重于定义依赖关系解决机制。The customization focuses on defining dependency resolution mechanisms. 提供了两个扩展点，以实现托管程序集解析：The provides two extension points to implement managed assembly resolution: 1. 提供的第一次机会若要解决该程序集，将其加载，并将其返回。The provides the first chance for the to resolve the assembly, load it and return it. 如果将返回`null`，则加载程序将尝试加载到程序集。If the returns `null`, the loader will try to load the assembly into the . 2. 如果无法解析的程序集，原始获取第二个机会解决该程序集。If the is unable to resolve the assembly, the original gets a second chance to resolve the assembly. 运行时将引发事件。The runtime raises the event. 此外虚方法允许自定义默认的非托管程序集解析。Additionally the virtual method allows customization of the default unmanaged assembly resolution. 默认实现返回`null`，这将导致运行时搜索要使用其默认搜索策略，这对于大多数情况下已足够。The default implementation returns `null`, which causes the runtime search to use its default search policy which is sufficient for most scenarios. ### 技术挑战Technical challenges * 不能加载多个版本在单个进程中运行时。It is not possible to load multiple versions of the runtime in a single process. > [!CAUTION] > 正在加载多个副本或不同版本的 framework 程序集可能会导致意外且难以诊断的行为。Loading multiple copies or different versions of framework assemblies can lead to unexpected and hard to diagnose behavior. > [!TIP] > 使用远程处理和/或进程间通信使用进程边界来解决此隔离问题。Use process boundaries with remoting and/or interprocess communication to solve this isolation problem. * 程序集加载时间会使测试和调试困难。The timing of assembly loading can make testing and debugging difficult. 程序集是通常加载，而无需立即解决其依赖项。Assemblies are typically loaded without their dependencies immediately being resolved. 在需要进行加载依赖项：The dependencies are loaded as they are needed: * 当代码分支到的从属程序集。When code branches into a dependent assembly. * 当代码加载资源。When code loads resources. * 当代码显式加载程序集。When code explicitly loads assemblies. * 实现可以添加新依赖项可能需要进行隔离，以允许存在的不同版本。The implementation of can add new dependencies which may need to be isolated to allow different versions to exist. 最简单的实现会在默认上下文中将这些依赖关系。The most natural implementation would place these dependencies in the default context. 精心的设计可以隔离的新的依赖项。Careful design can isolate the new dependencies. * 绑定隔离进程创建多个类型具有相同的类型名称。The binding isolation process creates multiple types with the same type name. * 这可能会导致令人混淆的错误消息，例如"Foo.Foo 无法将类型转换为类型 Foo.Foo。"This can lead to confusing error messages, for example "type Foo.Foo cannot be cast to type Foo.Foo." * 跨隔离边界封送处理很重要。Marshalling across isolation boundaries is non-trivial. 典型的解决方案是使用仅加载到默认加载上下文的程序集中定义的接口。A typical solution would be to use an interface defined in an assembly which is only loaded into the default load context.

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, allows an assembly to be resolved and loaded based on its .
The loaded assembly, or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在程序集解析期间方法具有程序集名称解析为加载的程序集的第一次机会。During assembly resolution, the method has the first chance to resolve the assembly name to a loaded assembly. 它可以加载程序集，也可以返回`null`。It can either load an assembly or return `null`. 如果它返回`null`，解析过程将继续。If it returns `null`, the resolution process continues. 请参阅为完整的过程的描述。See for the full process description. > [!IMPORTANT] > 若要防止递归堆栈溢出，不要调用此实例的从此方法的方法。To prevent recursive stack overflow, do not call this instance's method from this method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Reflection.Assembly LoadFromAssemblyName(class System.Reflection.AssemblyName assemblyName) cil managed

param.name: assemblyName
param.span: 描述要加载的程序集的对象。

span.span: The object that describes the assembly to load.

summary.span: 根据 解析并加载程序集。

span.span: Resolves and loads an assembly given its .

returns.span: 已加载程序集或引发事件。

span.span: The loaded assembly, or throws.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 加载程序集通过解决。 loads an assembly by resolving the . 这会触发完整的解决方法。This triggers a full resolution. 解析回退序列执行此过程：1.The resolution fallback sequence follows this process: 1. 方法调用。The method calls . > [!IMPORTANT] > must not call this method to prevent recursive stack overflow. 2. Unless the assembly is loaded or an exception is thrown, the method attempts to load the assembly in the default . 3. Unless the assembly is loaded or an exception is thrown, the method fires the event. 4. Unless the assembly is loaded or an exception is thrown, the method fires the event. > [!NOTE] > 如果引发`assemblyRef`指定完整的程序集名称和匹配的简单名称的第一个程序集具有不兼容的版本或区域性。 is thrown if `assemblyRef` specifies the full assembly name, and the first assembly that matches the simple name has a incompatible version or culture. 加载程序不会继续探测的其他程序集的简单名称相匹配。The loader does not continue probing for other assemblies that match the simple name. 每个可以仅加载: \* 的可执行程序集的一个版本。Each can load only: \* One version of an executable assembly. \* 一个版本的每个区域性的附属程序集。\* One version of a satellite assembly for each culture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 托管程序集的本机映像是预实时编译以优化特定平台上运行。The native image of a managed assembly is pre-jitted to optimize running on a specific platform. 程序集路径指向的 IL 版本的程序集的路径。The assembly path refers to the path to the IL version of the assembly. 因为 IL 通常包含在本机映像，它是一个可选参数。It is an optional argument as the IL is typically included in the native image. 它可由运行时作为回退如果找不到本机映像。It can be used by the runtime as a fallback if the native image is not found.

span.span: The argument is not an absolute path.
The argument is not an absolute path.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance native int LoadUnmanagedDll(string unmanagedDllName) cil managed
Protected Overridable Function LoadUnmanagedDll (unmanagedDllName As String) As IntPtr
abstract member LoadUnmanagedDll : string -> nativeint override this.LoadUnmanagedDll : string -> nativeint

param.name: unmanagedDllName

span.span: Name of the unmanaged library.

param.span: 这通常是不带路径或扩展名的文件名。

span.span: Typically this is the filename without its path or extensions.

summary.span: 允许派生的类按名称加载非托管库。

span.span: Allows derived class to load an unmanaged library by name.
A handle to the loaded library, or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认实现始终返回`null`。The default implementation always return `null`. 当`null`返回，则在运行时加载的库使用其默认策略。When `null` is returned, the runtime loads the library with its default policy. 可以重写此虚拟方法，以自定义的非托管的库搜索算法。This virtual method can be overridden to customize the unmanaged library search algorithm. 在重写时可以使用名称来标识库。When overridden the name can be used to identify the library. 已加载的库不需要匹配所请求名称，但可以根据需要转换。The loaded library does not need to match the requested name, but can be transformed as needed. 这可能包括调整平台特定命名的名称。This could include adjusting the name for platform specific naming.

A handle to the loaded library.

MemberSignature.Value: .event class System.Func`3<class System.Runtime.Loader.AssemblyLoadContext, class System.Reflection.AssemblyName, class System.Reflection.Assembly> Resolving
Public Custom Event Resolving As Func(Of AssemblyLoadContext, AssemblyName, Assembly)

summary.span: 在尝试加载到此程序集加载上下文时，程序集解析失败时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the resolution of an assembly fails when attempting to load into this assembly load context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要返回的程序集的指定，或返回此事件的处理程序负责`null`如果无法识别该程序集。It is the responsibility of the handler for this event to return the assembly that is specified, or to return `null` if the assembly is not recognized. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果此事件注册了多个事件处理程序，直到事件处理程序返回值不是按顺序调用事件处理程序`null`。If more than one event handler is registered for this event, the event handlers are called in order until an event handler returns a value that isn't `null`. 后续的事件处理程序将被忽略。Subsequent event handlers are ignored. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 它是值得注意的内容是否可以对任何此事件添加处理程序，包括默认上下文。It is noteworthy that a handler can be added for this event on any , including the default context.

.method public hidebysig instance void Unload() cil managed

summary.span: 开始卸载此 。

span.span: Initiates an unload of this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks + 如果它是可回收 AssemblyLoadContext 只能是卸载。An AssemblyLoadContext can only be unloaded if it is collectible. + 卸载将以异步方式发生。Unloading will occur asynchronously. + 卸载不会发生时对 AssemblyLoadContext 的引用。Unloading will not occur while there are references to the AssemblyLoadContext.

span.span: Unloading is not allowed.

summary.span: 卸载 时发生。
